column2: Very lethargic; on the verge of death; ungroomed; mouse technician reported tumor on verge of ulcerating and concerns for survivability over weekend; T1- R flank, small
Very lethargic; on the verge of death; ungroomed; mouse technician reported tumor on verge of ulcerating and concerns for survivability over weekend; T1- R flank, small
Skull was very soft and brain was damaged during removal (hind brain was separated from rest).
